title: Falcons-Panthers TNF Recap: Atlanta manages not to blow 4th-quarter lead  (Football 10/30)
description:
The Falcons held on to a 4th-quarter lead. If we didn't have a normally scheduled show, this might even warrant an emergency podcast. Will Brinson, Ryan Wilson and John Breech break down Atlanta's 25-17 victory over the Panthers, examining what the Falcons did to try to cough up the lead and why Carolina couldn't capture it. Does Raheem Morris deserve a shot as a coach somewhere? Is the hype train for Joe Brady slowing just slightly? We talk coaches and a lot more on this recap pod.
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @ryanwilsonCBS, @johnbreech, @CodyJBenjamin, @E_DeBerardinis
